statements: REVOKE SELECT ON BiotechnologyLab TO scientist1;
REVOKE INSERT, UPDATE ON BiotechnologyLab TO lab_manager;
REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES ON BiotechnologyLab TO admin;
REVOKE DELETE ON genes FROM user1
REVOKE UPDATE (gene_id,gene_name) ON genes FROM user2
REVOKE SELECT ON proteins FROM user3
REVOKE INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON research_projects FROM role_name;
REVOKE SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON researchers FROM role_name;
REVOKE INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON experiments FROM role_name;
REVOKE SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE ON Gene FROM user1
REVOKE SELECT, DELETE ON Protein FROM user2
REVOKE SELECT, UPDATE ON DNA FROM user3
REVOKE SELECT ON Gene FROM PUBLIC
REVOKE INSERT ON Protein FROM PUBLIC
REVOKE UPDATE ON Lab FROM PUBLIC
